TopicTitle: War of Insanity Unofficial Fan and Informational page (seeking new members)

Articles.Content:
> 
> World of Tanks is the *one game* that induces more rage in me than League of Legends (hugely popular at my school so I played it, there were many ragequits).

Lol, the only tank that makes me want to rage quit is the M3 Lee. Aka Turd on Tracks
I might join in, this is cool looking.

> 
> I might join in, this is cool looking.

Hey, the more the merrier!
Captain Sierra? Want to join?

> 
> Captain Sierra? Want to join?

When did something change? I thought that was already official? I mean I spent close to half an hour scouring my laptop backups to dig out my lorebook. I intend to actually use that ya know. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
We moved to the location on the op. Thank starwhip for making the site.

> 
> We moved to the location on the op. Thank starwhip for making the site.

Been registered on that forum too since he made it. Le's get this party started.

> 
> Been registered on that forum too since he made it. Le's get this party started.

Moo! Hey, who let the cow in here!? Bloody farmers... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Bloody farmers... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Bum badum bumbum babum?

Well, if you're ready to go, post in this thread on the new forum:

[War of Insanity Roll Call](http://warofinsanity.freeforums.net/thread/10/roll-call-post-ready)

We have to figure out who goes first. (Not it! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) I seriously have no idea what I'd put)

Let me get done with my homework for the night and will start.... i may as well end part 2 and we start at part 3.
Ok, just posted a Hackett report on the new page effectively ending Part 2 and immediately starting Part 3!
We are now on part 4! Can you believe it?

Part 4:

With Captain Sierra and Starwhip plotting against Captain Sampa Firespitter, will Firespitter manage to survive? Find out by reading the story!
Temporarily calling it quits on the story..had enough of,the riff-raff...moderators, you were right...
All moderators now have unimpaired, and exclusive rights to "I told you so."
At this point...i don't care...my character was going to,die anyway...so, i suppose that the harvester series idea dies with it. I had such high hopes...

I'm just surprised that we couldn't have gotten along better. But members using staff powers on other users without the consent of the rest of the staff was a no-go for me, no matter if the result was minuscule.

> 
> I'm just surprised that we couldn't have gotten along better. But members using staff powers on other users without the consent of the rest of the staff was a no-go for me, no matter if the result was minuscule.

Yeah, i made a final,visit to the site to post a notice of us closing up,shop. I had such high hopes...heh, i gues Sierra got her wish to kill my character after all.

- - - Updated - - -

Wait...i just thought of an idea to possibly save it. Moderator rules.
Can SOMEONE tell me what happened to the forum?

> 
> Can SOMEONE tell me what happened to the forum?

Long story short: s\*\*\* hit the fan

IF we do continue, all mod/admin actions must be allowed by the rest of the staff.

We're a democracy
We also,should include an appeals system.
I find that a very APPEALING idea.
Yeah, just a thought in case the moderators make a mistake.
